title: Unable to find peers
body:
geth --networkid 999 --ipcpath ~/Lbrary/Ethereum/geth.ipc --rpc --rpcaddr "127.0.0.1" --rpcapi="eth,net,web3,db,personal,web3" --rpcport "8545" --datadir=./data --rpccorsdomain "*" console

I used this command to run my private blockchain, but couldn't find any peers. It also says that "db" rpc api is not available.

C:\Users\lenovo\OneDrive\Desktop\first-edition\ethereum\setup>geth --networkid 999 --ipcpath ~/Lbrary/Ethereum/geth.ipc --rpc --rpcaddr "127.0.0.1" --rpcapi eth,net,web3,db,personal --rpcport "8545" --datadir=./data --rpccorsdomain "*" console

I'm not sure what you are trying to achieve here. You want to create your own private network? Then you either need to specify the other nodes with the `--bootnodes` flag or add them on the console using `admin.AddPeer()`
